sentences.english: There are many factors that affect the quality of soybean lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 影響大豆磷脂質量的因素很多。

sentences.english: The content of phosphatide in anser eggs was higher than goose's significantly.
sentences.chinese: 大雁卵中磷脂含量明顯低於鵝卵。

sentences.english: The methods of qualitative and quantitative analysis of the phospholipids are established.
sentences.chinese: 磷脂色譜定性及定量分析方法的建立。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare chitosan-phospholipid complex and identify it.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備殼聚糖磷脂複合物並鑑定。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids were produced from soybean phospholipids by phospholipase A1 acid hydrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 採用磷脂酶A1催化酸解大豆磷脂獲得溶血磷脂。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids were produced from soybean phospholipids by phospholipase A1 acid hydrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 採用磷脂酶A1催化酸解大豆磷脂獲得溶血磷脂。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids were produced from soybean phospholipids by phospholipase A1 acid hydrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 採用磷脂酶A1催化酸解大豆磷脂獲得溶血磷脂。

sentences.english: The change of anticardiolipin antibody was determined by enzyme linked immunoabsorbent assay (ELISA).
sentences.chinese: 抗心磷脂抗體採用酶聯免疫吸附法測定。

sentences.english: The sphingomyelin pathway is a ubiquitous signaling system, in which ceramide acts as a second messenger.
sentences.chinese: 鞘磷脂途徑是一普遍存在的信號系統。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids are often observed in plant lipid extracts .
sentences.chinese: 溶血磷脂在植物類脂提取物中常看到。

sentences.english: Apoptosis has a correlation with the phospholipids loss.
sentences.chinese: 凋亡的發生與磷脂脫失具有平行關係。

sentences.english: Results Oven dry after steaming with peel, the content of phosphatide in Raidx Cynanchum bungei Decne was highest.
sentences.chinese: 結果帶皮蒸後烘乾的白首烏磷脂含量最高。

sentences.english: The inner leaflet of the bilayer has very different composition than that of the outer leaflet.
sentences.chinese: 磷脂雙分子層的內葉在構成上與外葉有很大不同。

sentences.english: This is because eggs are full of vitamin B12 as well as lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲雞蛋富含維生素B12和卵磷脂。

sentences.english: The whole wheat germs contain lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 完整的小麥胚芽含有卵磷脂。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
